api kawuruth sihina dakimu.sihina athurin sundara sihina dakinnata kawuruth risi wethi.sihinayath, yatharthayath athara athi sabandiyawa, sihinaye sundarathwaya ho bhayankarathwaya thiranaya karayi.sihinayath yatharthayath duras wathma, sihinayen midunu kala athi wana bhayankarathwaya ho aprasannathawayada wadiwe.sihina thamantama mawa gatha haka.esema thawath ayawalun wisin sihina mawa eewa wenath ayata balimata salaswiya haka.eewa balana athamun eewa thula jiwath wannata pelambae.janamadhyaya, jana samajayak thula sihina mawannawu prabalathama madhyayaki.madhyayen mawiya yuthu sihina thiranaya karanne madhyaye pawathmehi prabala sadhakayak wana welanda wyaparayi.atha diga hara wiyadam karana paribhogika jiwana ratawak sahitha jana samajayak me sihina thulin bihi kirima owunge aramunayi.ee, eya owunge pawathmehi pradhanathama sadhakaya wana nisaweni.owun wisinyatharthayen duras wu sihina lowak thula jiwath wana samajayak kara wathman parapura danatamath ragena gos hamaraya.me sihina samajaye mayim, nimnayan lakunu karanneda, awashyathawayan thiranaya karanneda owun wisini.me sihina samajaya thula minisekuge watinakama eseth nathi nam ohuta labiya yuthu gaurawaya boho wita thiranaya wanne anduma mathaya, noesenam bahira penuma mathaya.pitin balu wita itha hondin anda palanda siti nam ohu wadagath mahatheki, nathinam nonamahathekiya.ee,me sihina lowa thula wadagath kame nirnayakaya, bhahira penumata simakara thibima nisaya.minisekuge aathma abhimanaya sandaha balapannawu sadhaka athurin pahalinma athi sadhakayak wana bahira penuma owun wisin metharam ihalin thaba aththe, eya pawathwa ganima sandaha ee ha sabandi bhanda ha sewawan rashiyak paribhojanaya kala yuthuwa athi nisaya.eya itha labadayi wyaparayaki.ada welanda pole andum aayiththam wala mila ganan, eewaye saba nishpadana watinakamata wada itha ihalaya.kiya kiwwath me sandaha wiyadam karannata minisun sadi pahadi sitinne thama aathma abhimanaya etharamma thamanata wadagath wana nisaya.emenma me sihina samajaya thula oonama ayekuta atha paya diga hara wiyadam kara mana bahira penumak labaganimen, wadagathekuge charithayata awathirna wiya haki nisaya.me nisama bahutharayak thama watupen wishala kotasak andum palandum menma rupalawanya katayuthu sandahada waya karanne rupaya ho sundarathwaya ismathu kirima udesa pamanakma nowa, wanijathwaya wisin thana di athi nirnayakayanta anuwa aathma abhimanaya ha bandi thama wadagathkama rakaganima udesaya.mehi bohodenekuta wasanwa athi sathyaya wanne, thama wadagathkama ho aathma abhimanaya, etharamma wadagathkamak nathi bhahira penuma ha sambandha kara thana athi sihina nirnayakayayi.meya methanin nonawathi.thawath mulika awashyathawayak wana aaharada mewanwu sihina nirnayakayanta hasuwa atha.wadagathunge bojunhal dasatha pathira atha.ithin athamun mewayehi ringanne badapirennata yamak kamata wada thama thathwaya pawathwaganimataya.badapirennata mewayin kamata tharam wathkamak bahutharayak wana pahala madhyama panthikayinta natha.ithin owun mewayehi gos yantham lewa ka ethi.thama paribhogikayangen bahutharayak wana, pahala madhyama panthika me lewa kannangen honda labayak upaya gannata me welandun samath wethi.manda, yantham mas katu kallak ha ala pethi kihipayakin samanwitha wana aduma mila aaharaya rupiyal desiyada ikmawana bawini.upan dinaya ,wiwahaya, wani jiwithaye wadagath samarum siyallantama me sihina nirnayaka panawi atha.mathaka sita wiwaha uthsawaya hindi sihina chithrapatiyak ha samawa pawathwanayuru, ee sandahama wenwu rupawahini wadasatahan walin idiripath karayi.mewa siyalla anga sampurna wiwaha uthsawayanya.mewan uthsawa pawathwiya hakke mulu jana samajayen siyayata dahayakatath adu pirisakataya.ese wuwath me sihina lowa thula atharaman wana tharuna tharuniyan thama athe hatiyata nowa hithe hatiyata wiyadam kara thama wiwaha uthsawaya pawathwannata gos hathara athe naya wethi.game gode gini poli karayage karyabaraya itukarana wadagathek me sihina samajaya thula siti.ee kredit kad ekaya.“hithe hatiyata wiyadam kara pasuwa gewanna”.ee ehi themawayi.gewanna bari wana wita kredit kad eketh gini poli karayageth wenasak natha.
